228 
WGUS83 KIND 091707
FLSIND
FLOOD STATEMENT
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE INDIANAPOLIS IN
1207 PM EST TUE DEC 9 2014

......The Flood Warning is no longer in effect for portions of the
following river in southern Indiana...

  East Fork White River...

.The East Fork White River has fallen below flood stage at Seymour in
southern Indiana.

Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Be alert to flood debris on previously flooded roads. Keep children 
away from flooded areas. Recreational and agricultural interests 
should remain alert to changing river conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web. From
the blue menu bar on the left side of the page...click on rivers and 
lakes.



INC071-093-175-091737-
/O.CAN.KIND.FL.W.0212.000000T0000Z-141210T0518Z/
/SERI3.1.ER.141207T0230Z.141208T1000Z.141209T1620Z.NO/
1207 PM EST TUE DEC 9 2014

The Flood Warning is cancelled for
  The East Fork White River at Seymour.
* At 11:48 AM Tuesday the stage was 11.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 12.0 feet.
* Fell below flood stage at 11:20 AM Tuesday.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to 9.9 feet by tomorrow 
  morning.
